step1.message: Step 1: Open tiktok.com in a new tab and make sure you're logged in to your account.

step2.message: Step 2: Come back here and click the button below to start the process.

list1.message: The extension will open your TikTok profile

list4.message: Remove it from your reposts and go to the next

list5.message: Repeat until all reposted videos are gone

note.message: Note: If you have a lot of reposted videos, the process may take a while. TikTok might temporarily block actions if too many happen too fast. In that case, wait about 1 hour and try again.

tip.message: Tip: When the process finishes, refresh your TikTok profile to confirm that all reposted videos were removed.
